name: ion-cast
description: > This example includes a Javascript and an Android application that must both be running to get playback on the Chromecast.   > See [here](https://codelabs.developers.google.com/codelabs/cast-receiver/#2) for help running this code locally.   > To run the app you must register a receiver [here](https://cast.google.com/u/0/publish/#/overview), and change the `app_id` value in `res/values/strings.xml` to the receiver app ID.
author: vivek.kumar@nagra.com
